Description: Fragment of Cypriot pottery transport amphora handle with attachment to body; cream slip; broad vertical grooves on inside wall; incised inscription.
Curator's comments: Published by A.W. Johnston, 'Fragmenta Britannica II; sherds from Naukratis', BICS 1982, 36
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 391)
Johnston 2006b / The Delta: From Gamma to Zeta (p.29 Table 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.069)
